alert.note: Alert for Dawes; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:28PM CDT until July 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dawes County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 727 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Harrison, or 20 miles east of Lusk, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrison and Van Tassell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
